oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Unidentified family atop Point Lookout
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unidentified family atop Point Lookout, Lookout Mountain, Tennessee. The man and woman seated to the right of the group are each holding a toddler in their arms. The photograph was taken by R. M. Linn and Brothers,; photographers. Royan Linn established a photography studio on Lookout Mountain in 1863 shortly after the battles for Chattanooga in November 1863.
